derivation: or תֹּעֵבַה; feminine active participle of H8581 (תַּעָב);
outline:
1. a disgusting thing, abomination, abominable
    1. in ritual sense (of unclean food, idols, mixed marriages)
    2. in ethical sense (of wickedness etc)
strongs_def: properly, something disgusting (morally), i.e. (as noun) an abhorrence; especially idolatry or (concretely) an idol
